lead: Hi, I'm Alexandre. I am a Fulstack developer / DevOPS.
description: I am passionate about programming and the world of open source software. I try to contribute to the open-source world at my personal projects and various contributions on Github / Gitlab.
bookDescription: I have written two books under a free license. API on Rails and REST-API.ts that teach best practices for building an API with Ruby on Rails or Node.js (I wrote about it in this post).
